name: Sigformation
description:
You can provide valuable comments and suggestions in steam community, or any ideas email to AnotherKnifeGames@gmail.com. I hope you also participate in the development process!

Learn the Fundamentals Of Digital Circuits

You can master the rules of digital circuits through this game, and the difficulty of the levels is progressive.

Complete the Level With Limited Components

Each level is very challenging, sometimes the difficulty is increased by limiting the use of electronic components.

Write Code, and Build Circuits that Carry Program Functionality

Later levels will unlock CPU usage, allowing you to write code to solve more complex problems.
